attributes.action: Change the law which, at present, prevents illegal immigrants from being deported without a passport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is common knowledge amoungst illegal immigrants that if they can not produce their passport, they can not be deported.  If they can not produce a passport they should be detained instead of being released where they then disappear insted of then reporting back to immigration.  There should be another way of establishing their nationality in able to deport them without a passport.  The alternative should be jail, they have acted illegally after all!
